name: A Drift In Heaven
description:
For GameDev.TV Game Jam,

Controls: Press A or left arrow to move LEFT, D or right arrow to move RIGHT, SPACE to fly. Press SPACE continuously to keep going up!

Description: Enjoy some time flying around in Heaven! This game is my first ever game made with Unity. The goal was for a relaxing time made without any real goal. Sorry I didn't get to add a quit button.

Thanks to Kenney for PNGs of Environment

Thanks to Spring for PNG/GIF of Angel

Course I would like is: 

Unreal Engine 5 C++ Developer: Learn C++ & Make Video Games
